title: Problem-Based Learning (PBL)-Enhanced Dental Practice Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Course targeting corporate dental product/service managers, focusing on improving problem-solving skills through analysis of real clinical cases

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex dental patient cases and derive solutions through PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities.
Learners can improve self-directed learning ability by over 20% through small-group collaboration (4-6 members).
Learners improve technical knowledge (oral anatomy, treatment protocols, etc.) by over 30% and achieve over 80 points in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
